showScoreExcerpt: "The simplicity of the production provides breathing room in a megamusical that often exhilarates, but also drains because of its tendency to always think bigger."
bwwExcerpt: The bare-bones staging keeps the focus squarely where it counts: on the cast of nearly 40, who are uniformly topflight and in sync when it comes to sparking emotional electricity. The simplicity of the production provides breathing room in a megamusical that often exhilarates, but also drains because of its tendency to always think bigger.
